casebody.data:
BYRNES v. WALKER, WARDEN. No. 396,

Misc.

Decided April 23, 1962. Petitioner pro se. Jack P. F. Gremillion, Attorney General of Louisiana, Scallan E. Walsh, Assistant Attorney General, and Albin P. Lassister for respondent. Per Curiam,

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded for a hearing. Herman v. Claudy, 350 U. S. 116.

Mr. Justice Frankfurter took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
